page.title: 07Bryn Celyn Minirugby Comp.
page.content: In the above tournament,ten teams from East Cardiff junior schools come to Bryn Celyn Junior School to play for the Dave Bishop Trophy.There are two fields with two leagues;one league per field.The tournament begins at 9.30 am and ends at 1.00 pm.Mr.D.Bishop,a local publican presents the trophy and individual plaques to the winning team.Mr.J.Regan presents the Player of the Tournament Trophy.Throughout the morning Bryn Celyn parents serve refreshments.programmes containing all the information are sold at ten pence each. The tournament has been going for five years,and the winners have been,St.Philip Evans,three times and Glan-yr-Afon and Bryn Celyn once each. Simon Greedy and Jeremy Evans.
